mapper.select: select schedule_no, schedule_member_no, schedule_ahzit_no, schedule_title, to_char(schedule_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') schedule_start, to_char(schedule_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') schedule_end, schedule_allday from schedule where schedule_ahzit_no=#{scheduleAhzitNo} order by schedule_start asc

select schedule_no, member_no, place_no, schedule_title, schedule_content, schedule_headmax, to_char(schedule_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') schedule_start, to_char(schedule_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') schedule_end, from dangSchedule where schedule_no=#{scheduleNo} and schedule_start>=sysdate order by schedule_start asc
mapper.insert: insert into schedule values(dang_schedule_seq.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{placeNo}, #{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleContent}, #{scheduleHeadmax}, to_date(#{scheduleStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_date(#{scheduleEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'));

insert into dangSchedule(schedule_no, member_no, place_no, schedule_title, schedule_content, schedule_maxhead, schedule_start, schedule_end) values(#{scheduleNo}, #{MemberNo}, #{placeNo}, #{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleContent}, #{scheduleMaxhead}, to_date(#{scheduleStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_date(#{scheduleEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
